sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { fetchBillData } from "../store/actions"; import persianJs from "persianjs"; import moment from "jalali-moment"; import GasBillLogo from "../asset/img/naft_iran-01.svg"; import GasMan from "../asset/img/gasman.png"; const GasTemplate = () => { const billData = useSelector(state=> state. GetBillReducer.data) const timeConverter = (time) => { const engDate = moment(time * 1000).format("YYYY/MM/DD"); const perSianDate = persianJs( moment(`${engDate}`, "YYYY/MM/DD").locale("fa").format("YYYY/MM/DD") ).englishNumber()._str; return perSianDate; }; const persionConvertor = (data) => { const persian = persianJs(`${data}`).englishNumber()._str; return persian; }; const translateNumber = (num) => { const translatedNum = persianJs(num).digitsToWords().toString(); return translatedNum; }; return (
{billData.owner}
{billData.address}
{ persionConvertor(billData.zipCode)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.companyArea)} { persionConvertor(billData.climate)} { persionConvertor(billData.consumerID)} { persionConvertor(billData.factoryID)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.billingSeries)} { persionConvertor(billData.fileNumber)} { persionConvertor(billData.consumerType)} { persionConvertor(billData.bundle)} { persionConvertor(billData.consumerCount)} { persionConvertor(billData.capacity)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.previousConsumption)} { persionConvertor(billData.currentConsumption)} { timeConverter(billData.previousReading)} { timeConverter(billData.currentReading)}
{}
{billData.consumption < 1000 ? persionConvertor(billData.consumption) : ""} {1000 < billData.consumption && billData.consumption < 2000 ? persionConvertor(billData.consumption) : ""} {billData.consumption > 2000 ? persionConvertor(billData.consumption) : ""}
{billData.companyAddress}
{ persionConvertor(billData.cost)}
/ { persionConvertor(billData.debt)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.otherLiabilities)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.tax)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.insurance)}
/ { persionConvertor(billData.debtBalance)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.remainingRials)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.deductionRials)}
{}
{ persionConvertor(billData.zipCode)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.paymentID)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.billingID)}
{ timeConverter(billData.paymentDeadline)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.payableAmount)}
{ translateNumber(billData.payableAmount)}
.
); } export default GasTemplate;
